Convert Freesurfer aparcs Table to brainGraph

aparcs_to_bg.Rd

Converts Freesurfer aparcs table to brainGraph naming convention, relying on aparcstats2table

aparcs_to_bg(subjects, measure, ...)

Arguments

subjects

subjects to analyze, passed to aparcstats2table
measure

measure to be analyzed, passed to aparcstats2table
...

additional arguments passed to aparcstats2table

Value

Long data.frame

Examples

if (have_fs()) {
   fs_subj_dir()
   df = aparcs_to_bg(subjects = "bert", measure = "thickness")
   print(head(df))
}
#> source '/Applications/freesurfer/FreeSurferEnv.sh' || true ; aparcstats2table --hemi lh --subjects bert --delimiter tab --parc aparc --debug --measure thickness --tablefile /var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T//RtmpKwCuIy/filec7ba541a1876.txt 
#>     id  name thickness
#> 1 bert lBSTS     2.768
#> 2 bert lcACC     2.719
#> 3 bert lcMFG     2.803
#> 4 bert  lCUN     1.813
#> 5 bert  lENT     3.329
#> 6 bert  lFUS     2.717
